HOME-PAGE.FIND_PET_DESC: Experience the magic of finding your soulmate companion through our revolutionary pet matching technology. Every connection creates a lifetime of unconditional love.
HOME-PAGE.PREFERENCES_MATCHING_DESC: Our advanced AI technology analyzes your lifestyle, preferences, and personality to create perfect matches with your ideal companion.
HOME-PAGE.INSTANT_COMMUNICATION_DESC: Connect instantly with verified shelters and caring pet guardians through our secure, trusted messaging platform.
HOME-PAGE.FEATURE_SEARCH_DESC: Explore our exclusive collection of extraordinary companions, each waiting for their perfect family match.
HOME-PAGE.FEATURE_MATCH_DESC: Our intelligent matching algorithm connects you with verified shelters and the ideal pet that complements your unique lifestyle.
HOME-PAGE.FEATURE_ADOPT_DESC: Begin your extraordinary journey of companionship, love, and endless joy with your new family member.
HOME-PAGE.FOOTER_SLOGAN: Creating forever bonds between hearts and paws.

ABOUT.HERO_SUBTITLE: Connecting hearts and paws to create forever families through compassionate pet adoption.
ABOUT.MISSION_DESCRIPTION: At Pawfect, we're solving two critical problems: giving shelter animals the visibility they deserve and making pet adoption simple and joyful for families. We believe that finding your perfect companion shouldn't be complicated - it should be magical.
ABOUT.FEATURE_COMPASSION_DESC: Every animal in our network receives the love and attention they deserve while waiting for their forever home.
ABOUT.FEATURE_SAFETY_DESC: All shelters and adopters are verified to ensure the safety and wellbeing of every pet.
ABOUT.FEATURE_COMMUNITY_DESC: Join thousands of pet lovers who have found their perfect companions through our platform.
ABOUT.FEATURE_EXCELLENCE_DESC: We continuously improve our platform to provide the best experience for pets, shelters, and families.
ABOUT.STATS_SUBTITLE: Together, we're making a difference in the lives of pets and families.
ABOUT.STORY_PARAGRAPH_1: Pawfect was born from witnessing a heartbreaking reality: countless loving animals sitting in shelters, invisible to families who would adore them, while potential adopters struggled with complex, intimidating adoption processes.
ABOUT.STORY_PARAGRAPH_2: We saw how the traditional adoption system failed both sides - shelters overwhelmed with amazing pets that no one could discover, and families who gave up on adoption because it felt too difficult, bureaucratic, or uncertain.
ABOUT.STORY_PARAGRAPH_3: Our mission became clear: transform pet adoption into a joyful, simple, and transparent experience. Today, we've helped thousands of shelter animals find visibility and loving homes, proving that technology can solve real-world compassion challenges.
ABOUT.VALUES_SUBTITLE: The principles that guide everything we do.
ABOUT.VALUE_SUSTAINABILITY_DESC: We're committed to creating lasting positive change in animal welfare and responsible pet ownership.
ABOUT.VALUE_TRANSPARENCY_DESC: Open communication and honest practices build trust between shelters, adopters, and our platform.
ABOUT.VALUE_INNOVATION_DESC: We continuously evolve our technology to better serve pets, shelters, and families in their adoption journey.

CONTACT.HERO_SUBTITLE: We're here to help you on your pet adoption journey. Reach out to us anytime!
CONTACT.METHODS_SUBTITLE: Choose the best way to reach us. We're always happy to help!
CONTACT.HOURS_DESC: We're here to help during these hours
CONTACT.DEPARTMENTS_SUBTITLE: Our dedicated teams are here to assist you with specific needs.
CONTACT.DEPT_ADOPTION_DESC: Get help with the adoption process, application questions, and finding your perfect pet match.
CONTACT.DEPT_SHELTER_DESC: Information for shelters looking to join our platform and expand their reach.
CONTACT.DEPT_SUPPORT_DESC: Having trouble with the website or app? Our tech team is here to help.
CONTACT.SOCIAL_SUBTITLE: Stay connected and see the latest success stories from our community.
CONTACT.CTA_SUBTITLE: Contact us today and let's find your perfect companion together.
